Texts.Eng: I hope whoever used this wagon last didn't contract anything...
Texts.Chs: 我希望上次使用这辆车的人没有签任何合同...

Texts.Eng: I imagine the novelty of this cute wagon wears off after a few hours of travel.
Texts.Chs: 我想，经过几个小时的旅行，这辆可爱的马车的新奇感逐渐消失了。

Texts.Eng: It's awfully cramped inside. But I suppose it does its job.
Texts.Chs: 里面很挤。但我想它能完成它的工作。

Texts.Eng: Not exactly comfy, no, but I'm sure those folks didn't have much of a choice.
Texts.Chs: 不太舒服，但我相信那些人没有太多选择。

Texts.Eng: The #1 choice for settling the west in style. Oxen not included.
Texts.Chs: 西进风格的第一选择。牛不包括在内。

Texts.Eng: These boards are dreadfully coarse... I'm likely to get a splinter just looking at them!
Texts.Chs: 这些木板非常粗糙...我一看到他们就很可能被刺成碎片！

Texts.Eng: This wagon will do just fine for carrying those who want to start anew.
Texts.Chs: 这辆马车可以载着那些想重新开始的人。
